bioconda.name: bioconductor-pathnet
bioconda.summary: An R package for pathway analysis using topological information

biotools.summary: This tool uses topological information present in pathways and differential expression levels of genes (obtained from microarray experiment) to identify pathways that are 1) significantly enriched and 2) associated with each other in the context of differential expression.

bioschemas.name: PathNet
bioschemas.summary: This tool uses topological information present in pathways and differential expression levels of genes (obtained from microarray experiment) to identify pathways that are 1) significantly enriched and 2) associated with each other in the context of differential expression.
